content: Speak to the Pale-Axe Stalwart, who will be pleased you've not been harmed. Keep prompting him to talk so you exhaust all of his dialogue. Eventually, he'll tell you about the five element carts and ask you to destroy them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass I' and the sub-subsection 'Boss Fight - Pale-Axe Stalwart'.
The content is as follows:
Speak to the Pale-Axe Stalwart, who will be pleased you've not been harmed. Keep prompting him to talk so you exhaust all of his dialogue. Eventually, he'll tell you about the five element carts and ask you to destroy them.
